page.title: 06THRESHFIELD PARISH COUNCIL
page.content: {Parish Councils}are responsible for local adminstration and are elected by{Ratepayers.}Their duties are numerous but include: Any problems occuring are looked into and assistance given to alleviate them, i.e litter, overhanging trees, blocked footpaths, inefficient street lighting,public transport time tables, and many more day to day happenings which help or hinder the ratepayer. An amount is precepted for each year from the{District Council,}to enable{Councillors}to cope with all expenses during the year, such as planting of trees, salaries for the {Clerk}and{Greenkeeper,}postage and telephone,Insurance and Audit fees. {Councillors}stand for three years and attend meetings at{District}and{County level if matters concern the{Parish.
